dct_title_s: A more or less inaccurate map of Taos, New Mexico : and guide to the land of mañana in a state of peace
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. "Scale of miles? Everything is out of scale around here so what's the use!" From: Four hundred years in Taos / Ruth G. Fish. Taos, N.M. : El Crepusculo, [1940?]
